For Faculty & Instructors


Health protocols continue to be important for protecting ourselves and each other. Here are Stanford resources to help community members reduce the spread of COVID-19.
Environmental Health & Safety: Information on COVID-19 positive-case reporting and assistance, testing, masking, potential building exposure list, and submitting questions.
Cardinal at Work: Information and guidance on COVID-19 employee workplace policies (including vaccination requirements), resources, and assistance.
